descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92520/92520-1534594489-1034313907.png[/img]﻿
[size=6]
A SIMPLE FOLLOWER AS ALWAYS

[/size]
[size=6]Summary
[/size]
Standalone follower
Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun
Young Eager Voice like Ysolda
Weight 70
Good at anything except for magic
Marriageable


[size=5]Options on the installer[/size]


UNP or CBBE
2k or 4k
Hairstyles
    Public hair ←


[size=6]Recommended Mods[/size]


One of the Follower overhaul mods such as AFT
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288 <= [color=#f1c232]this. seriously.[/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul - RDO[/url] by cloudedtruth <= She hardly smiles without this.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30533/?]Face to face conversation[/url] by towawot


[size=5]Mods used on the screenshots[/size]

[spoiler]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53442]zzjay's wardrobe[/url]﻿ by zzjay
Vanilla Armors and Clothes – TMB by Robton
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77960]Midnight Light Armor for UNP and UUNP[/url]﻿ by sa547
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20415]Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation[/url]﻿ by brokefoot
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13569]Osare Maid Outfit - UNP[/url]﻿ by anano
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80267?]CBBE HDT - UUNP HDT Bodyslide for Full HDT Maid Outfit with Cleavage[/url]﻿ by ColonolNutty
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83736]Ultimate Assortment[/url]﻿ by FavoredSoul
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67309]KS Jewelry[/url]﻿ by Stealthic and Kalilies
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69784]RUSTIC CLOTHING[/url]﻿ by Gamwich
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70975]ImoMegane - Glasses[/url]﻿ by hangakin
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43609]Osare Culort Outfit - UNP[/url]﻿ by anano
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6150]Kaw Cat Disguise Set[/url]﻿ by foxey
GomaperoPose

[/spoiler]

[size=6]Q & A[/size]

Q : She makes FPS drop as heck
A : It's probably a conflict between her skeleton and your skeleton

[1]
meshes\actors\character\character assets female\skeleton female.nif <= COPY THIS

*You need to install one of the Skeleton mods such as XPMSE if there is no skeleton female.nif there.

[2]
and paste(overwrite) it to meshes\actors\character\Minazuki\ HERE

Unfortunately this way makes her body proportion different from what I intend but fps is more important.


Q : I lost her..
A : Try [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051]this.[/url]


Q : Her face is different from those screenshots..
A : For the enb users. Try tweaking Subsurface Scattering settings.
  For the non enb users. Try [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73473]Quick Light[/url]  or something like that.



Q : Want to change her body
Q : Want to change her Skeleton
A : Data\meshes\actors\character\Minazuki\ HERE


[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92520/92520-1532854212-1112830534.png[/img][/center]
author: rxkx22
